game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of El Dorado.
game.description: The legendary city of gold, El Dorado, is said to be hidden deep in the Amazon jungle. Your quest is to find it and bring back its riches.

task.objective: Speak to the old man in the tavern.
task.description: He might have some useful information about where to start your search.

task.objective: Collect the ancient map from the hidden temple.
task.description: The map will lead you to El Dorado.
task.location: Hidden Temple, north of the city

task.description: The river is infested with dangerous piranhas and strong currents. Be cautious.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians of El Dorado.
task.description: The guardians will not let you approach the city without a fight.
task.location: El Dorado, deep in the jungle
